com.layers.app.services

Class RestBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layers.app.services.RestBusinessService

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest/inventory")
 @SessionAttributes(value={"userToken","locationToken","requestToken"})
public class RestBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object

    This is an Open Endpoint REST application programming interface. This REST service includes debugging POST and GET methods, and contains a crucial method logScaleAction that the Arduino submits an HTTP POST message with a data body to for this service to consume. Others services include endpoints to for views to Ajax liquor lists from.

    @RestController Behaves has @ResponseBody for all endpoints, returns Objects in JSON

      • getUnregisteredLiquors

        @GetMapping(value="/getUnregisteredLiquor")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Liquor>> getUnregisteredLiquors(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
        Open endpoint to return a list of all unregistered liquors (drinks not associated to a scale). This service was deprecated for a business service intregrated into a method in the scale controllers
        Parameters:
        model - Session of the user in ModelMap.
        Returns:
        A list of unregistered liquors, wrapped in a response entity to set the HTTP Status of the response.
